text: Kamani vahe'ma mani'nazana tamagri knare zanku huzmantege'za mani'nazanki'za, Anumzamofo eri'za vahere. Hianagi kagrama hazenkema nehanunka, korera hugahane. Na'ankure zamagra hazenkema hanaza vahe'mokizmi, knomazamino zamazeri fatgohu hankavea eri'naze, kano zamiza zamazeri fatgo hanaza agafare, Anumzamo'a zmantege'za mani'naze.
